entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bay Roberts
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:49 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain overnight. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 cm inland. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High zero. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 12:48 AM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
